document_data.name: Trebbe's Scry Magic
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Trebbe's scry magic''''' was a weak [[arcanist]] spell from the [[Fields of Mythal|Field]] of [[mentalism]]. It was developed in [[Netheril]] by the [[archwizard]] [[Trebbe]] in [[-2270 DR|1589 NY (âˆ’2270 DR)]].<ref>

Knowledge of its effect was lost in later ages, so that its relation to the spell of similar name and equally small power, ''[[detect magic]]'', remained unclear.<ref group="note">''Trebbe's scry magic'' was supposed to be detailed in the ''Encyclopedia Arcana'' book from ''[[Netheril: Empire of Magic]]'', but was missing there.
